attributes.action: demand that the Department of Trade are given authority to regulate British Industry to stop opening up Telephone Call centres in India and other overseas countries to the detriment of UK employment in existing or new call centres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason for this petition is to bring pressure on organisations such as British Telecoms and various Banks who close down UK call centres and move their call centre operations overseas and thereby give an inferior service from India and elsewhere, as well as putting UK call centre employees out of work. There is a pressing need to return call centre work to the UK.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=+call+centres
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
